title: Ginger and walnut pavlova
ingredients: ['3 egg whites, beaten stiffly', '220g caster sugar', 'Pinch of cream of tartar', '1 teaspoon cornflour', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '1 teaspoon vinegar', 'For the filling', '250ml cream, whipped', '70g walnuts, chopped', '90g preserved stem ginger from a jar, chopped', '2 tablespoons raspberry jam', 'Pinch of grated nutmeg', 'A few cherries or berries, to decorate']
